testsuite.name: Test
testsuite.system-out:
?[1;31m Start test 1?[0m > /help The program calculates the addition, subtraction, division, multiplication and power of numbers, including BigIntegers. It can also assign and store the numbers in separate variables provided through assignment operator such as "a = 17628368", and calculate the complex result using stored variables as well. It uses HashMap, so the process of store and retrieving the values of the corresponding variables are very efficient.
To get started simply declare your variable with its corresponding values in new line, such as input = 76187268".
To get the result, simply input the desired expression such as 57 + 76172 - (a * 187829), and it will output the result.
You can also use parenthesis () to set the precedence.
Finally, to exit the calculator, simply type /exit, and that should stop the program. > > n = 32 > 33 + 20 + 11 + 49 - 32 - 9 + 1 - 80 + 4 -3 > 33 + 20 + 11 + 49 - n - 9 + 1 - 80 + 4 -3 > c = n > c = 2 > c 2 > 11 - 13 + c 0 > 5 --- 2 ++++++ 4 -- 2 ---- 1 10 > /start Unknown command > var1 = 1 Invalid identifier > var = 2a Invalid identifier > c = 7 - 1 = 5 Invalid identifier > variable = f Invalid assignment > variable = 777 > Variable Unknown variable > variable = 777 > Variable Unknown variable > /exit Bye! ?[1;31m Start test 2?[0m > 4 * 3 12 > 91 / 13 7 > a= 7 > b =2 > a * 4 / b - (3 - 1) 12 > /exit Bye! ?[1;31m Start test 3?[0m > 7 + 3 * ((4 + 3) * 7 + 1) - 6 / (2 + 1) 155 > /exit Bye! ?[1;31m Start test 4?[0m > 8 * (2 + 3 Invalid expression > 4 + 5) Invalid expression > 2 ************ 2 Invalid expression > 2 // 2 Invalid expression > /exit Bye! ?[1;31m Start test 5?[0m > n = 32000000000000000000 > 33000000000000000000 + 20000000000000000000 + 11000000000000000000 + 49000000000000000000 - 32000000000000000000 - 9000000000000000000 + 1000000000000000000 - 80000000000000000000 + 4000000000000000000 + 1 -2999999999999999999 > 33000000000000000000 + 20000000000000000000 + 11000000000000000000 + 49000000000000000000 - n - 9000000000000000000 + 1000000000000000000 - 80000000000000000000 + 4000000000000000000 + 1 -2999999999999999999 > c = n > c = 2000000000000000000000 > c 2000000000000000000000 > 11000000000000000000 - 9000000000000000000 - c + 1998000000000000000000 0 > 5000000000000000000 --- 2000000000000000000 ++++++ 4000000000000000000 -- 2000000000000000000 ---- 1000000000000000000 10000000000000000000 > a= 7000000000000000000 > b =2000000000000000000 > a * 4000000000000000000 / b - (3000000000000000000 - 1000000000000000000) 12000000000000000000 > /exit Bye!
